data.description:
You are in the stable hand's quarters.
The stable hand's quarters are very plainly decorated, with wooden torches situated in stone carvings in the wall. There are bunk beds with cheap hay and feather mattresses for the stable hands to rest in while not working. There are small sacks, as well as beaten and splintered wooden chests for them to keep their belongings in. One small window shines light into the very center of the room.
The woman is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I know the woman has a treat for me
data.mid_motivation: I would like to eat before I go for a walk
data.long_motivation: I must show the woman my loyalty so she continues to feed me
